hero.title: Partnering for Business Excellence
hero.subtitle: Sanggabiz Consulting provides department-as-a-service solutions to save costs and boost efficiency.

about.title: What is Sanggabiz?
about.description: Sanggabiz is a partner business solutions that provides department-as-a-service, including Finance, HR, Customer Service, Marketing, Project Management, Administration, and Operations. We help you to save up to 80% manpower cost.
